name: Barda: A Blind Legend
description:
Barda : A Blind Legend is a 2D top down, thriller and puzzle game based on the lore of Si Buta dari Gua Hantu

Follow the adventure of a wise blind man and his monkey friend, deep in the horrific forest of Indonesia. It's 1850, The dutch has begun to dominate and colonize the Nusantara Territories.

Barda Mandrawata, a martial art warrior and his monkey must escape from the dutch. Aided only by the monkey and his sense of sound, They will have to solve all the puzzles and obstacles in their struggle to survive.

Input control : 

WASD/Arrow Keys - movement
Tab - Merge and Unmerge
Space - Change Character
